description.value: You weave dispelling energy into a spell. If your next action is to cast a single-target spell against an enemy, and you either hit the enemy with the spell attack roll or the enemy fails its saving throw, you can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Dispel Magic] on the enemy as a free action, expending a spell slot as normal and targeting one spell effect affecting the enemy.

value.value: dispel magic in your spell repertoire
